readable.title: 2354456107_bf5c766a05
readable.content: A man holding money , standing in front of a street band and a store . A man holds a dollar bill in front of his face while posing in front of a street band . A man holds money in the air . A man in a green jacket is standing outside a store holding some money in front of his face . An African-American man wearing a green sweatshirt and blue vest is holding up 2 dollar bills in front of his face , while standing on a busy sidewalk in front of a group of men playing instruments .
